【考法 1】 adj. 愚勇的，鲁莽的： foolishly adventurous or bold
【例】 that brash motorcyclist likes to show off by riding on only one wheel 那个鲁莽的摩托车手喜欢炫耀单轮骑车
【近】 audacious, brassy, daredevil, madcap, reckless, temerarious
【反】 circumspect, guarded, heedful, prudent, wary
【考法 2】 adj. 缺乏判断力的，不明智的： showing poor judgment especially in personal relationships or social situations
【例】 He was reprimanded['reprɪmɑːnd] for his brash comments
【近】 imprudent, injudicious, tactless, undiplomatic
【反】 advisable, discreet, tactful 明智的
【记】 同rash
